verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] praising Scott Pruitt 's work as head of the Environmental Protection Agency — but stressing his concerns as well .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: praising] [ARG1: Scott Pruitt 's work as head of the Environmental Protection Agency] — but stressing his concerns as well .
